segments.text: Oh my goodness, this is absolutely terrifying to watch!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That sink is overflowing so much; it's going to ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, and someone is definitely going to slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has no idea, which makes it even more dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her calm demeanor is unsettling given the hazard at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the children are the real concern right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is wobbling precariously, it could tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so high up, reaching for the cookies; a fall from that height could be very bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely worried he's going to break something or seriously injure himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so close, she could easily be caught in the fall too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation is a recipe for a major accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout out a warning to them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of those little ones getting hurt makes me feel sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is not going to end well, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR
